issue.title: mydesigns.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mydesigns.io/product-catalog](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmydesigns.io%2Fproduct-catalog) ### Comment > Chat does not appear when enabled ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ibcr3vnskrso4w8sksg0goc40c0o48o1nm11i0b74o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/l6t5s7kfxhwo4kgkksgkgkg40gk0g4snkhv9jvg9jk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.19.0 (4853) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `User DNS filter (url: none)` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | Avast ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&clid=jFF8kp&custom_filters=User%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520DNS%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=15&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4.10.108&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.19.0+%284853%29&referrer=&scheme_version=2&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.19045.0&url=https%3A%2F%2Fmydesigns.io%2Fproduct-catalog&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F130.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=true)
